body.style: height:1200px;background:#ececdf url('wpimages/wp200a6cd2_06.png') repeat-x scroll center top;

p.a: Click here for open enrollment application.

p.span: Students and Parents wanting to pick up belongings or clean out lockers can do that from 8:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. on April 15, 16, 17, 20, 21. We ask that no more than 6 people are in the building at a time, and that people wait outside if there are already 6 people in the building.
